name: soccerbots-control-system
description: SoccerBots Robot Control System - Native Desktop Application

scripts.build:backend: echo 'Python backend ready - no build required'
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:electron:wait"
scripts.dev:electron:wait: wait-on http://localhost:8080/api/health http://localhost:5173 --timeout 60000 && cd electron && npm run electron
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../electron && npm install && cd ../python_backend && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: npm run build:all && cd electron && npm start
scripts.dist: npm run build:all && cd electron && npm run build

author: SoccerBots Team
